title: The Universe by Scientific Field
alt: The math and philosophy people also claim everything, but the astronomers argue that the stuff they study really only comprises a small number of paper surfaces.
transcript:
The Universe by Scientific Field[A pie chart is shown. It is white except for a single black line going from the edge of the circle to the middle.]
Astronomy [The white space]
99.9999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999997%Other [The black line]
0.0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000003%
